caller_intent: The caller wants to reinstate an automatic payment for her husband's disability insurance policy after a previous cancellation and confirm the payment is active.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the policy type (disability) and checked the current balance ($155.53).
Agent verified the payment method (existing routing/account numbers from prior documentation).
Agent processed the automatic payment using the joint business account details.
Agent sent a confirmation email to ambervarner@hotmail.com with payment details.
knowledge_required: Automatic payment setup and reinstatement process
summary: A caller contacted Alliance Insurance to reinstate an automatic payment for her husband's disability policy after a prior cancellation. The agent verified the policy details, confirmed the payment method, processed the reinstatement, and sent a confirmation email. The issue was resolved successfully.
